content: As we turn to our outlook, we anticipate first quarter 2023 net sales to be in the range of $230 million to $240 million and we are seeing the following for our 2023 annual guidance; full year 2023 EBITDA margin to be in the 26% to 27% range; selling, general and administrative expenses in the range of 15% to 16% of net sales; an effective tax rate of approximately 25% to 26%; interest expense in the range of $8 million to $9 million; depreciation in the range of $45 million to $47 million; and capital expenditures in the range of $130 million to $140 million, which primarily relates to the modular build-out of our Arkansas facility calibrated to demand trends.
